title: New: Osca – Illume
content:
Anyone watching last nights latest humiliation of Man Utd.

will probably have heard Osca soundtracking the closing credits, accompanied by numerous shots of a very glum looking van Gaal. With their debut track, Blood, reaching the Sky Sports audience, they’ve released their second offering, in the form of the equally anthemic Illume. So there’s perhaps more than a hint of Coldplay to them, but hey, what’s wrong with ambition? Perhaps Rooney & co. could do with a little more…
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
